column4: so... I'm attempting to follow this walk through here: http://askubuntu.com/questions/18903/how-to-enable-trim but everytime I attempt to run the hdparm command.. I get "reading sector 5805056: FAILED: Input/output error"  any ideas?
sounds like that sector has a fault
if it's a bad sector.. then how is it able to create the temp file there?
